sentence: Greene and Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.) recently traveled to Texas to boost far-right activist Christian Collins, hoping to force him into a runoff against former Navy SEAL Morgan Luttrell, who's backed by the McCarthy-aligned Congressional Leadership Fund.
title: 6 House races to watch in Texas
